overview: The vulnerabilities for women in our country have remained the same ever since. Needless to say, women are more likely than men to be raped in the middle of the night.  There are no men here to let her go home safely. The rape incident has been going on for women since that day. Did you start talking about rape as soon as I took it? For rape, one I would say let's see what true story has to do with a ritual.  who is affected by this ritual & Nisharin Saif who plays.  Writer Bala comes home to Nishar's Saif home. Saif by writer Bala Nishar asks about life. Nishar's Saif begins to tell about their lives. Bala pays close attention to it and asks Nishar's Saif, Bala when a ceremony like this takes place do you want to ask the girl for consent? Bala asks, "Isn't it?" Nishar's Saif answers. Nishar's Saif begins to say angrily, "This ritual has the same meaning as rape." Do you know how much ritual people do now?
title: Sithai
